verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: roseanne barr] [V: explains] [ARG1: why her tweet against valerie jarrett was n’t racist comedian roseanne barr explained what led her to tweet a message many called racist and led to her leaving the revival of her hit show roseanne here what she said barr spoke to sean hannity of fox news on thursday in an attempt to explain that the tweet was not motivated by any racism on her part actually i was hacked barr joked no i 'm kidding barr tweeted a joke saying that former obama official valerie jarrett was an ape which immediately led to a public outcry barr said she did n't know jarrett was african - american and believed she was white abc subsequently cancelled the show that is a political tweet she explained that is a tweet about asking for accountability from the previous administration about the iran deal which valerie jarrett is the author of and that what was in my head the first thing was shock that they were saying it was racial when it … valerie jarrett roseanne roseanne barr]
